attributes.action: Allow the new research vessel to be named Boaty McBoatface
attributes.background: Jo Johnson plans to block the new vessel from being called Boaty McBoatface despite this name being chosen by the people of the UK on an internet poll.  We live in a democracy, not a dictatorship and us Brits expect the vote to be recognised regardless of how silly it may seem to one person.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the Natural Environment Research Council, not the Government or Parliament.
